dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm telling you, they're here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're we gonna do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone out. Fait's started searching the room.       Tearing it apart

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gotta save Vanessa.     I gotta find 'em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not leaving you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, you are.    Go.   Now. Someone starts RATTLING the LOCKED DOOR.      Fait doesn'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T. Come on, man. They're outside. Give it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up and get the fuck outta here! That's an order! Miles hesitates. Fait's unreachable. Chambers' men are trying to break down the door. Miles goes. Out the window Onto the ascender-descender. And gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daria finishes dressing.     When...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Y'know, I got the big one... Her response is a front kick to the head. Followed by a spin kick, knocking him out. Then, stepping past him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep it in your pants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRASH!   Odion and his men break down the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fait's still searching. Desperate to find the stones. Desperate to save his daughter. He fights off the first men to reach him. A wild animal. Fights off another. And then... The guns are out.     All pointed at Fait. No stones. No

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daria walks out the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willy Chickens hovers near Chambers, who is talking as he eats another meal. Lobster. At first, we don't realize wh Chambers is addressing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... If you're willing to pay five, you're willing to pay ten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're    willing to pay ten, you're willing    to pay twenty. Twenty, forty.     Forty, eighty... I'm not selling    till I know exactly where the ceiling    is. Whereupon we see who he's talking to:     Ling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You like foreplay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much money do you want for the stones?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate foreplay. Fuck the warm-up drills -- girl's gotta get in there and be ready to score points. Bring it straight to the motherfucking hoop. You understand? (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, instead of us going back and forth doing warm-ups, my idea's for you to think of a number. A very high number. A very final number. A number so high and final it'll get me off good, bam, right when I hear it. Chambers hasn't looked at Ling the whole time.       Stil looking. Forks up some lobster meat. When...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chickens' face suddenly appears in front of him. And... Ling slams a lobster claw deep into Chickens' neck. Chamb doesn't wait for whatever's next. Jumps back. Fast for a big man. But Ling is much faster. Stronger. Deadlier. Quickly, and quietly beats Chambers like a drum. Chambers knows when i finally tent-folding time. Croaks surrender through the blood and swelling --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, okay... Ling stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ain't worth my life... I'll take the five and call it a game.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ling emerges from the cell through the blankets. Closing the blankets behind him. To the sentries, who've heard nothing --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Chambers is resting.   He says not to bother him. OFF which, as Ling walks away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FIND Chambers. No one will bother him. Ever.       The lo fork driven deep into the base of his skull.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Archie still looking for the man with the diamond pinkie-ring. Su still following.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... By the way, when we do find him, what then?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll handle it. In the cage, a fight has just ended. The loser's unconscious and looks like he stepped into a spinning airplane propeller. The winner doesn't look much better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The midget RING ANNOUNCER steps in with a mike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seven advances, eleven's out... Next up, eight versus twelve. Eight versus twelve. Fighters report to the cage. As Archie and Su continue the search --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're after the stones, too, huh? No response from Su.   Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I did some more checking around to see what anyone knows about 'em... Guess who get back to me? My Defense Department connection. Now, I think he's calling me about this surplus F- 14 Tomcat I'm trying to get my hands on. But no. Turns out he's calling to tell me about a rumor outta Taiwan about black stones -- In the ring, we see another bruiser waiting to fight as t midget calls out --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Number twelve!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Su)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- only they're not jewels --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Number twelve!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're -- Suddenly, seeing the "12" card in Su's hand, a FIGHT CLUB FAN grabs his arm and raises it. Yells out --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twelve's right here! Su pulls his arm back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd be scared of him, too. Su glances into the ring, seeing the BRUISER for the first time. The Bruiser's beckoning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go, chickenshit! Su waves them off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not today... The catcalls start.    Archie leans into Su.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know it    wasn't the plan. But if you don't    fight, they're gonna toss us out on    our asses. We might never find the    guy. A long beat.    Su hates this place.   Su hates Archie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fait's in handcuffs. A big cut on his head. Being escorte by two COPS to the stairs leading out of the club. To Odion, as they pass him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's pretty beat up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Fell down the stairs... Enjoy the jail sex, Fait. As they continue up the stairs --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better have the E.M.T.s look at his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Near, but not too close. The club visible in b.g. Daria, Miles, and Tommy watch as Fait is led into an ambulance. Via earwigs --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're still here to help you, T.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything you want us to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fait's heard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet. The PARAMEDIC treating him doesn't understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: BEHIND FAIT'S BACK
dialogues.text: His cuffed hands.    Fingers feeling the inside of his be Finding a spot where a small rectangle has been cut into leather. Popping out the rectangle to reveal a hollowed-o recess in the belt. Where... Fait has a hidden handcuff key.

dialogues.speaker: ANOTHER SET OF HANDS
dialogues.text: struggling against their duct-tape bonds.   REVEAL...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa's hands are taped together behind her back. There tape around her feet. Tape over her mouth. The TV is ON nearby, but she's not watching. Vanessa struggles a moment longer, but can't break the ta Finally gives up trying. Just lies there. Tired and scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DING! The crowd's yelling and betting as number eight leaves his corner and advances on Su. Su has nothing against number eight. He's just trying to buy time. So he dodges his opponent. Not exactly running. Fighting by not fighting. A target one moment, gone the next. Again and again, number eight swings and misses. Until... Number eight delivers a knockout blow. Unfortunately it's against himself. The momentum of a missed punch carries him headfirst into a metal post. Number eight drops. As the referee counts over number eig Su uses the chance to find...

dialogues.speaker: ARCHIE
dialogues.text: still checking out the hands of African-American men in the crowd. Not making any friends as he does it.

dialogues.speaker: SU
dialogues.text: Number eight's on his feet.    Moving in again.   When...

dialogues.speaker: ARCHIE
dialogues.text: Suddenly, he sees it.    The ring.

dialogues.speaker: SU
dialogues.text: dodges number eight again. Then... Sees Archie signaling he's found the guy. And... Gets nailed by number eight. A solid hit. Exciting the crowd and pumping up number eight Whereupon... Su turns to him and bows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You win. Su turns, heads out of the cage. The crowd roaring its disapproval. As... The midget Ring Announcer bars Su's path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No quitting.    Get back in there. Su moves him aside. The midget resists. Five other waitin fighters come to the midget's aid. Forcing Su back into t cage. Where... It's now Su against them all.

dialogues.speaker: HOT DOG STAND
dialogues.text: Daria, Tommy and Miles wait. Two     extreme MOTO-RIDERS dressed in leathers have pulled up    in a truck and gott to eat. In the back of the truck     is a motorcycle and four-wheel ATV. The two men Ogle     Daria. To her --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking good. She ignores them.     To each other, so she can hear --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice rack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like the upstairs, like the basement,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up, assholes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fait's heard. Looks past the Paramedic. Past the Cops talking outside. Sees the hot dog stand in b.g. Sees the truck with the motorcycle and ATV parked near the stand. Paramedic finishes bandaging Fait. To the cops outside --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's all patched up. A Cop calls inside to Fait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go. Fait stands.     Starts out.   Into his mike --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get ready to move. And we see... The handcuffs aren't on him anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fait reaches the rear doorway.      When... He jumps. Knocks one Cop down.      Shoves another aside. takes off running. Fait's caught the cops completely by surprise. It takes a few moments before the cops give chase, some on foot, oth by car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fait runs toward the truck parked by the hot dog stand. To Daria, Miles and Tommy, looking on --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the car.     Stay close. As Daria, Miles and Tommy quickly mobilize, Fait jumps in the bed of the truck. Jumps on the ATV. IGNITION. The Moto-Riders suddenly realize what's happening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Too late. Fait blasts out of the rear of the truck.   Rig through the nylon mesh tailgate. Fait flies from the truck bed. Lands on the hood of a police car. Gets big air off the windshield. Clears the rest of the car and grabs pavement with all four wheels. As Fait tears off, and cop cars follow, one of the Moto- Riders jumps into the bed of the truck and climbs aboard remaining motorcycle. His friend calls to him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't let that fucker get away! The Moto-Rider FIRES UP the MOTORCYCLE. Drops it into first. Dittoes Fait's leap out the back and SCREAMS off i pursuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa still taped up.    TV still ON.   When...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... We go now to this breaking story...

dialogues.speaker: INCLUDE TV
dialogues.text: Airing a chopper shot tracking Fait on the ATV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... You're watching a man on an all- terrain vehicle leading police in a high-speed chase through downtown Los Angeles. An L.A.P.D. spokesman says the man, Anthony Fait -- Vanessa looks over in surprise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- commandeered the A.T.V. after escaping from police officers while being treated at a local hospital for injuries resulting from his earlier arrest for robbery... And this is certainly one of the wildest chases we've witnessed here in L.A...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOOM! Fait's flying. Seventy-plus. Down streets, sidewalks, squeezing through places police cars can't. Over, under, around, through -- doesn't matter. The ATV's fast, strong and maneuverable. One problem: so is the moto-cross bike.     The guy's rig Fait's ass. Matching move with move. Overhead, police choppers follow Fait's every move. While on the ground other police vehicles move to block his pat But whenever Fait meets a roadblock, he somehow finds an escape. At one point, he uses an outdoor escalator. At another point he blasts through the Hotel Bonaventure. This'll be a news highlight for days to come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The place is bedlam. In the crowd, bets are going down on the battle royal, now in full effect inside the cage. Su versus the five fighters. And the midget. The different fighters use different fighting styles agai Su. Kickboxing, grappling, aikido, kali, American street fighting... Su uses all his own skills and whatever's at hand. At one point he engineers it so one opponent turns on another opponent. At another point, Su wields the midget like a fighting staff. One by one, Su starts reducing the opposition.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Fait's everywhere.   And so is the moto-bike.   Still on tail. Fait veers inside a building.   The bike follows.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS ACTION
dialogues.text: Fait and the moto-bike ascend the stairs.   One floor. floors. Up and up. Fait reaches the top-floor hallway.   Nowhere left to go except... Out the window at the end.   And... That's just where he goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And where he goes, the moto-bike goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ATV and the moto-bike make the first leap.    Onto th roof of a next-door building. From there, it's rooftop to rooftop.    Jump after jump. Longer and longer. Until... The MOTO-BIKE eats it in a spectacular CRASH.     The mot rider walks away, but his chase is over.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Fait's ATV SCREAMS down another street, still chased by cops. Into his mike --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Above ground parking garage in Chinatown?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Know it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's down to Su and the kick boxer.    The kick boxer spi and kicks and punches, and... Su just ties the guy up in his own clothes.    Ties him i pretzel. Cinches him tight. Then... Looks for Archie.     Can't find him. Can't find the guy wearing the ring.     And hurries out of the cage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fait jukes the ATV in the entrance.    Up the spiral ramp

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moments later, police CARS SKID up and seal the entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On TV, a chopper shot of the garage surrounded by police.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... And it looks like this chase will end here, as police seal off the building... OFF Vanessa, watching...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Su runs into the parking area. Archie's in the T-bird. Sitting, a little unnaturally in the front.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Decided to leave early.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd he go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right here. Su looks inside the car.

dialogues.speaker: CAR
dialogues.text: Where Archie sits atop the man with the diamond pinkie ri Holding a STUN GUN to the guy's cheek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good thing I brought my stunner. He ZAPS the air.    Then puts it back to the guy's cheek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, bud, wanna start the Q and A?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On TV, the chopper zooms in on a familiar car, as it roll down the exit ramp toward the police barricade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Here's a car coming down the exit ramp... We see the police approach the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... The police apparently talking to the driver... The police let the car pass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Now letting this car drive on as the search inside continues... Vanessa notices something about the car.     Looks carefu When... The car turns, giving the news chopper a better zoom angl of the people inside, and... Vanessa sees Daria, Miles and Tommy. Which could mean only one thing:    her daddy's safe.   A soon he'll be coming to get her. With a rekindled hope inspired by her father's escape, Vanessa now looks for a way to free herself from her duct tape bonds. When, just as it's about to seem hopeless again, her eyes go to... Her necklace.   The chain and pink diamond pendant. Vanessa bends over    and lowers her head until the neckl slides off onto the    bed. Then turns around and  picks necklace behind her    back. Holding it as taut as  she c between her hands,    she begins sawing away at the tape her wrists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gang's all here.    All eyes on the club.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew the stones were in there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Question is, how do we get 'em out? Place is slamming nonstop. A long beat.    Fait doesn't answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something isn't right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.   That's what I'm getting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doorman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Where the hell is he? (then)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone stay put. OFF which, as he and Su go --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MUSIC pumps downstairs as Su and Fait cautiously move dow the hall toward Chambers' office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No Chambers' guys.     I don't get it. They reach the closed office door, where they stop and listen. Hear nothing. Su and Fait exchange a "ready-ready" look.     Then Su op the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Su and Fait enter, unchallenged, to find... Odion and the other Chambers' men.    Dead.   Skull shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I get it now. Su ignores the bodies, quickly moves to the Zen fountain, where he reaches into the water and begins searching the rocks lining the bottom. Beat. Then --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are they there? Su doesn't answer, still searching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. This can't fucking happen.      They gotta be there. Another beat. Then, at last, Su holds something up: black stone. It takes Fait a moment to understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... What?     That's it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rest are gone. Fait can't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... What the hell happened?        Who got 'em?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Ling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... How'd he get here before us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's good. Beat.   Failure.       Summed up in one word:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa... (then, trying)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has the stones. There's      no reason to keep her. Hell, she's a      little girl, she's eight years old     -- she can't hurt him. He can let      her go... He can just fucking let her     go... Su just looks at him.        Not a chance.   And he knows knows it, too. It's over.     For Fait, it's as if his life just ended.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... What the hell am I gonna do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... We need to go. Fait doesn't move. Then, suddenly, it all explodes as rag and Fait picks up the large, stone ball spinning atop the fountain and, screaming, hurls it into a large display of exotica, destroying it. Beat.   Fait looks at Su, who meets his eyes.          Th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. OFF which, as Su mobilizes him, and they go...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ling pours the black stones out on a table.   To Sona and Charles --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're back in business. CHARLES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. I don't have to baby-sit much longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is everything else ready?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We just have to test the device. Russell, who's been working on his scientific contraption nearby, speaks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dye master oscillator. And not test, calibrate. Which I'm now ready to do... Goggles. When the goggles are on, Russell hits a switch.   And... Inside the contraption, brilliant green laser BEAMS begin bombarding a sensor. OFF which...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa succeeds in using the necklace   as a saw to free wrists from the duct-tape. She quickly    rips the tape f mouth. Untapes her ankles. Then tries     to figure out w next. Begins searching the camper for    anything that mi her escape or fight. When... Looking through the glove box, she finds a cell phone. An old model. So old, it takes her a moment to figure out exactly what it is. Then she pushes "Power," and... The phone turns on.    Sort of.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Low Batt" flashes on the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rock bottom. Fait's desolate, sitting on the sofa, staring off.      D tries to comfort him, but it doesn't help. Miles and Tommy stay close and stay silent. Even Archie's quiet for once. The only noise is Su, speaking into a cell phone in Chine to someone who is obviously his superior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I lost the stones. Ling has them... I don't know where he is... I have no way to find him... What do you want me to do? Under which, the PHONE begins to RING.    And... Fait's too upset to care about answering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa's on the old cell phone.    We hear RINGING on th other end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Answer, Daddy, answer...

dialogues.speaker: PHONE
dialogues.text: "Low Batt"... "Low Batt"...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The PHONE'S still RINGING.    After another moment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Want me to get that? Which finally mobilizes Fait to reach over and answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa whispers urgently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa! Which gets everyone's attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come get me!   Please!   I want to go home!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, baby, okay. Just calm down. Under which, in b.g., Su quickly ends the phone call to h superior. Still in Chinese --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll call you back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing, to Vanessa)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. I'm in a van inside a big building. They painted the windows. I can't look out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try.   Try to see something. Vanessa puts her eye to the window.    Finally finds a sm gap in the paint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Few details. Just some chairs and bright green light from Russell's contraption.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA'S PHONE
dialogues.text: "Low Batt"... "Low Batt"...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see chairs.    And there's green light. Fait repeats for the others' benefit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see chairs and green light? Where's the light coming from?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't tell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it bright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The green light, baby -- is it bright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.   Really, really bright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Su)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's real bright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy, hurry!    I'm scared!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, baby.    Just hang in there

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA'S PHONE
dialogues.text: Fait's voice drops out as the battery dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Daddy?!   Daddy?!... END INTERCUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Vanessa?... Vanessa!... Shit! Fait slams the phone down in frustration. But Su's mind is on what she told them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... He's doing it here.    Tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Selling the stones... A dye laser emits green light. He needs it to activate them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are these stones? Archie answers it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doomsday in disguise. All eyes go to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're some kinda new synthetic plutonium. Small and portable, but mega-powerful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This fucker's making bombs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not making them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, he'd need a big operation for that. Why bother? Just demonstrate the stones work and sell 'em to whichever international scumbag offers the highest bid. He makes millions, they make the bombs, then... 'look out, world.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Okay, so we know what he's up to. How's it get us to Vanessa? Su considers it a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The buyers will want to arrive and leave quickly... Somewhere private... Accessible by aircraft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa said she's inside a big building. Could be a hangar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man, there's dozens of little airports around here. We'd never get to 'em all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Flight plans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, yeah. Flight plans show destinations. All aircraft file 'em with the Aviation Administration. If we could get a list, we could maybe figure out where the sale's going down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Daria, call the aviation people. Use our L.A.P.D. credentials. We need flight plan info for all private aircraft in this area tonight... Everyone else get ready to move... Miles, the no-gun policy's revoked. You break out the heat... Tommy, you gotta get us a diversion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can help with that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Do it all fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ling, Sona, Charles, and Russell. Russell finishes testing his contraption.    Switches it Then, removing his goggles --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're operational. The others remove their goggles.    Sona checks her watch

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The buyers arrive in less then an hour. Beat.   Ling holds up a black stone and examines it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... So small. So deadly... We're selling conscience for money... A look at the others.   Serious.   Then a broad smile of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: consummate satisfaction suddenly spreads across his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... But it's a lot of money... Beat.   He puts down the stone.    A glance at the camper

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be ready to kill the girl and go as soon as the sale's over.

dialogues.speaker: TOPOGRAPHICAL MAP OF LOS ANGELES AREA
dialogues.text: Fait's finger indicates a spot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wick Airfield... PULL BACK TO...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fait, Su, Daria and Miles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Five private choppers arriving tonight within minutes of each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds like our best shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .. It better be, or my baby's dead. He and Su exchange a look.     Then --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: CORPORATE HELICOPTER
dialogues.text: Noselight beaming, the chopper lands next to four other high-end biz copters, including an Agusta A109, outside t hangar, where the bruised Ling killers stand guard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa peeks through a void in the paint covering the windows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An internationally-diverse group of men -- some occupying the chairs, some studying the contraption, some clearly muscle. Across the room, Sona and Ling greet the new arrivals. In all, sixteen men have arrived for the sale. There are five buyers -- one RUSSIAN, one AFRICAN, one PAKISTANI, o EGYPTIAN, one FRENCH. The French Buyer is in a wheelchair Each buyer has brought with him one right-hand man and on to three bodyguards. Vanessa SHIFTS her VIEW, REVEALING... Charles standing nearby.    Too close for her to escape. Charles turns, and...

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO VANESSA
dialogues.text: Quickly, before Charles can see her, she steps away from window. There's no way out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driving.   Daria and Miles following in their car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So tell me... How the hell's Taiwan fit into all this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of our scientists made the stones. Tried to go into business for himself. We stopped him. Recovered the stones... Ling betrayed us. He took them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ling?   He was one of you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were partners. Six of us. He killed the others. He thought he killed me, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what're you really after -- the stones or the payback?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Yeah... Let's get it all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the world's foremost arms dealers. You all know that weaponry equals power. And in the world of weaponry, nukes rule.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But nuclear material is hard to obtain and difficult to handle... But what if it weren't?... That's the question that brought you here tonight... And here's the answer. Ling holds up a single stone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In its present state, it's completely inert. Zero radiation, zero volatility... Whereupon Ling places the stone on a piece of velvet on a table. Folds the velvet over. Then, whack, hits it hard with a mallet. He unfolds the velvet.   The stone's smashed to pieces. Ling picks up a sliver of stone and hands it to Russell, places the sliver inside a small ceramic capsule, then inserts the capsule into his contraption.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goggles on. Everyone puts on goggles. Then Russell hits the switch, a the green lasers bombard the capsule containing the slive of stone, which begins to glow. Russell announces each passing threshold as a numerical readout on the contraption races up the scale --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Firecracker... .44 magnum... R.P.G... Sidewinder... SCUD... Tomahawk... Daisy Cutter... Hiroshima... two Hiroshimas... And it just keeps going.   Until, finally --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... New World Order. As the buyers absorb this... Russell shuts off the beams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goggles off. Russell removes the capsule and hands it back to Ling, wh holds it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One small    fragment. Transformed into a source    of immense energy. More powerful    than weapons-grade plutonium a hundred    times its size. A beat as this sinks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The purpose of today's sale is to begin trading a new commodity on the black market and establish its value... There are fifty stones available in the first sale. The opening price is one million per stone... Bids, please? The buyers indicate their bids both aloud and by using ha signals a la traders in a commodities exchange pit. At th same time, they're all crunching the numbers on calculato Ling looks on as Sona runs the sale, and Russell uses a laptop to input data and develops supply and demand marke analysis for Sona to consult. The pace starts out slowly and unevenly as the buyers fee out the situation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five at one million. Sona is silent.   Silence means "No."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five at one-point-two. Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three at two million.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll take that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six at one-five. Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten at two million. Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Near their cars. (NOTE: From now until the battle's over, it's night. At the airport, Fait, Su and Fait's team will all communicat via earwigs.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles, what do you see?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atop the building next to Ling's hangar. The five chopper rest on the wide tarmac below, between the two buildings. Miles scans Ling's hangar through the scope of a silenced sniper rifle.

dialogues.speaker: NO NIGHT VISION
dialogues.text: FINDING the Ling killers outside the hangar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two sentries my side. Then, scanning inside Ling's hangar THROUGH windows --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sale's at this end... There's a camper with painted windows. Middle of the hangar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa said she was in a van. That's gotta be it. (to Daria)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When we get her, you move her outta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: there fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll keep her safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Su's reached the top of outside stairs.    Opens a door a enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: High above the floor, Su steps onto a catwalk.    The sal continuing below. More heated now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eight at three. Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nine at three. Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten at three-one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll take that... There are now thirty-seven stones available. And now, in more and more rapid-fire succession --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five at three-five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eight at three-five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twenty at three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles.   Sentries.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: is already sighted in.   PULLS the TRIGGER.   PHUT!

dialogues.speaker: SENTRIES
dialogues.text: One Ling killer takes a leg hit and goes down. Before the second killer has time to react, he catches a BULLET in the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tommy and Archie. Watch out for the camper. Punch it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sale's now a frenzy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five at five million.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six at five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seven at five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten at five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten at five-one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five-two. When suddenly... KA-WHAM! Archie's Abrams TANK BLASTS through a wall and into the hangar. Archie's head pops out of the driver's hole. At the same time, Tommy pops up out of the turret and trains a mounte machine gun on the stunned group.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freeze, motherfuckers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Russell watches the advancing tank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew it!   I knew it!

dialogues.speaker: BEHIND TANK
dialogues.text: Fait and Daria enter through the hole in the wall using t Abrams for shelter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa peers out through a gap in the paint to see what' happening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charles is drawn away by the advancing tank.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO VANESSA
dialogues.text: She looks back into the camper. Finds a heavy iron skille amid the stove utensils. Swings it. And... SMASH!    She SHATTERS a side WINDOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We FIND Vanessa, jumping out of the camper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa's out of the camper.   Running this way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To Daria --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay. And he's gone, sprinting after her just as...

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: reaches a button for opening and closing the giant hangar doors. She jabs a button, and the nearest door begins to motor open.

dialogues.speaker: CHARLES
dialogues.text: hears the OPENING HANGAR DOOR.    Turns.   Sees Vanessa a goes after her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanessa rolls out under the rising door and runs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's out. Then, FINDING Charles coming after her --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a guy after her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BULLET rips through the collar of his leather coat. Jus behind his neck. Just missing him. But he keeps coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charles rolling out under the door.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: SHOOTS again.   PHUT!

dialogues.speaker: CHARLES
dialogues.text: The BULLET RICOCHETS off the PAVEMENT right next to him. a flash, he's up and running. Heading out into the darkne of the airfield after Vanessa. Meanwhile, back inside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In here, the hangar door continues to open as the tank ma its slow approach. Archie's not a great driver. Tommy sweeps the muzzle of the machine gun across the group.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just be cool! At which point, Russell breaks for his five-ton truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said don't move, motherfucker! Russell just keeps going. Slides open the side door in th back of the five-ton, revealing... A twin-fifty machine g Two barrels, .50 caliber. Dangerous even for a tank. Russell vaults in and takes aim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fucking amateurs! He starts FIRING. People start running. .50 CAL. ROUNDS t big CHUNKS out of whatever they hit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!   What do we do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoot back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How? The question's answered for him.   He somehow does the ri thing. And... Tommy's MACHINE GUN begins RIPPING CHUNKS out of the FIVE TON and EVERYTHING near it. Tommy's a horrible shot; the gun's more in control of him. But... Russell finally dies under a HAIL of HEAVY LEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twin .50's some major firepower. How'd that little shit get one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Motherfucker.    Couldn't fucking listen. INTERCUT WITH which...

dialogues.speaker: ACROSS HANGAR
dialogues.text: Ling and Sona are moving toward the limo. Ling has the stones. When... Su is there. Blocking the way. Sona attacks. Su easily blocks the counters. Knocking Sona bac Never taking his eyes off Ling. When... Sona, who's fallen back against a buyer's bodyguard, quic takes the bodyguard's small, full-auto SCORPION and turns the gun on Su. Su dives for cover as the BURST SHREDS the AREA where he' just been standing. As Sona continues hunting Su... Su se

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ling getting into the limo.    To Archie and   Tommy, as signals --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't let him get away! As a result of which...

dialogues.speaker: TOMMY AND ARCHIE
dialogues.text: Having just waxed Russell, see Ling in the limo. Tommy's is out of ammo. He switches to the .30 cal. tank's machin gun. As Archie steers toward the limo, Tommy begins BLAST away.

dialogues.speaker: LIMO
dialogues.text: Ling's trying to drive out, when the .30 CAL. SLUGS PUNCH HOLES in the LIMO. The tank keeps coming. Ling bails out the TANK CRUSHES the LIMO. INTERCUT WITH which...

dialogues.speaker: SU AND SONA
dialogues.text: Play cat and mouse. Su rapidly runs out of room to hide. He can't get away. Su stands. Faces her. Faces the inevitable. When... WHAM! Daria appears from nowhere. Kicks the gun from Sona's hand. To Su, re: Ling, now running from the crushe limo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get him. Su goes after Ling. And now it's Daria vs. Sona. Sona's a better fighter, but Daria's got passion on her side. It's a good fight. Until, at last, Sona finds the Scorpion. She swings it up. And... Daria executes a sudden, improvised double move that stri Sona's arm in such a way as to cause her to point the SCORPION at herself, just as she FIRES. The burst rips through her chest and kills her. And now, here's what's been going on outside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Charles runs from the hangar, chasing Vanessa across t tarmac into the darkness of the airfield...

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: flips to NIGHT VISION on the sniper-scope.    And...

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT VISION
dialogues.text: Charles and Vanessa become clearly visible. Charles is closing in on her. Cross-hairs FIND him. PHUT!

dialogues.speaker: CHARLES
dialogues.text: The BULLET knocks his gun from his hands.    Charles is s but keeps going.

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT VISION
dialogues.text: Charles reaches the flight line. Parked planes, a gas truck, a shed, etc. He disappears behind the equipment.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: sweeps the rifle, looking for Charles and Vanessa.     He Fait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lost 'em behind the gas truck.

dialogues.speaker: CHARLES
dialogues.text: stops behind the gas truck.   Looks around for Vanessa. sign of her. Until... Charles notices the door to the gas truck isn't closed al the way. He whips it open. And... There's Vanessa, hiding inside. Charles grabs her.   Yanks her out struggling and kicking

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time to end this my way. And then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drop the girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charles looks over.    Fait is there, holding a gun on hi Vanessa's relieved and excited to see her father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put her down. Charles lowers Vanessa to the ground.    He releases her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daddy! Vanessa runs to her father. Dives into his arms. It's a little more energetic than Fait was expecting. And... Suddenly, Charles uses the distraction to rush in behind her. He hits Fait hard. A kick sends the gun flying. Charles keeps coming. Charles keeps pounding. Fait's hampered by Vanessa. She won't let him go. Fait stays between Charles and Vanessa. Guarding his little girl. Barely managing to fend off Charles, a seemingly unstoppable force. The fight winds through the planes, under wings, through struts.

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT VISION
dialogues.text: Fait, Charles and Vanessa.    No clear shot.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: comms Fait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No shot.

dialogues.speaker: FAIT, CHARLES AND VANESSA
dialogues.text: The fight continues.   Fait's suffering under Charles' br attack. When... Vanessa causes Fait to stumble near a plane.   They fall. Charles moves in. And... Fait's hand goes to a set of chocks set against the plane wheel. The chocks are two heavy wooden blocks connected b a length of nylon rope. Fait turns to Vanessa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't move. Fait jumps to his feet. Swinging the chocks. Not quite like nunchakus; more like a medieval mace. And now, all o Fait's fury comes pouring out as he uses the chocks to be the living shit out of Charles. Charles tries to fight back, but he's out-matched by the chocks and Fait's emoti The punishing blows land like Thor's hammer. Until... A mighty swing nearly takes Charles' head off. Charles is unconscious before he hits the ground. Fait stands over Charles. Tosses the chocks down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong kid.    Wrong dad. Fait turns. He moves back to where Vanessa's still hiding He scoops her up. And... Father and daughter hold each other tight. Forever. During all of which, also INTERCUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ling, having just escaped being crushed in the limo, runs out just as... Four helicopters take off, one after the other, carrying the buyers away. The fifth chopper, an AGUSTA A109, is POWERED UP, waiting for the wheelchair-bound French Buyer, being helped by a bodyguard. Ling intercepts them. Knocks out the bodyguard and tips over the Frenchman's chair. Then jumps into the Agusta.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ling puts a gun to the pilot's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Su, having left Daria to fight Sona inside, runs out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Agusta begins to lift off. Su starts running toward t helicopter. Runs under the rising aircraft. Jumps. Just in time to... Grab onto one of the retractable rear wheel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the chopper transfers to forward motion, Su struggles get a foot hooked on something, anything. In the process, he kicks against the helo's sleek underbelly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ling hears the THUMPS.    Looks out.

dialogues.speaker: SU'S LEG
dialogues.text: swinging beneath the Agusta.

dialogues.speaker: LING
dialogues.text: To the pilot --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Retract the gear!

dialogues.speaker: CONTROL PANEL
dialogues.text: The pilot hits the wheels-up switch.     And...

dialogues.speaker: SU
dialogues.text: The gear begins to retract. Disappearing into the bottom the chopper. In a second, there'll be nothing left to hol

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoot it down!   Now! And then... Su lets go.      Drops fifteen feet to the gr As... Behind him, having clanked out of the hangar, the Abrams tank is stopped. The turret swivels toward the Agusta.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Archie aims the cannon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you hit it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problem.   Absolutely... Load. Tommy slides a shell into the breech.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Archie's locked on.     He hits the trigger.   And...

dialogues.speaker: ABRAMS TANK
dialogues.text: BOOM!   The big CANNON FIRES.      And...

dialogues.speaker: SKY
dialogues.text: The Agusta's tail is BLOWN AWAY by the CANNON SHELL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Archie and Tommy exult.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shot him right in the ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I did it.   I can't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thought you said it was no problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do I know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pilot hopelessly fights to keep the chopper from crashing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The out-of-control AGUSTA swings back toward Su and the hangar, losing altitude. Then SMASHES into the tarmac, ripping open the fuel tank, spilling fuel behind it as it caroms off the hangar and inscribes a large, skidding cir around Su before CRASHING into another CHOPPER and BURSTI INTO FLAMES. The spilled fuel ignites.    A circle of intense fire. Su in the middle. The Agusta pilot, still alive, has been thrown outside th circle. But Ling's only path of escape takes him inside. Into the circle. He emerges with the bag of stones. Su is waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were lucky last time.   You Won't be lucky again. The final fight begins. The two martial arts masters battle in the circle of fire using everything they can lay their hands on. Each the equal of the other. Each knowing it's a fight to the deat For a long time, the fight could go either way. Until... Ling gets an arm around Su's neck. Like Charles, Su thras and flails. Like Charles, he can't get away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll kill you fast.    You won't Feel a thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I won't.    You will What happens next happens in an instant: Su breaks the hold. Hooks one of Ling's arms.   Wrenches A direction it can't go. Ling's ARM BONES SNAP, TISSUES RIP. Ling screams in pain. Just as... Su pulls the ceramic Capsule containing the activated sliver of stone from Ling's pocket. And... Slams the capsule deep into Ling's open mouth. Ling gags, choking on the capsule lodged in his throat. His horror- stricken eyes meet Su's. Su lets him suffer another momen Then, in SUBTITLED Chinese --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is for our friends. And Su strikes him in the throat. A spearing, open-hand blow with his fingertips. Hard. Hard enough that...

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE LING'S THROAT
dialogues.text: The CERAMIC CAPSULE SHATTERS. Releasing the hot, glowing white sliver of stone into Ling's windpipe. The fragment' super high-energy radiation instantly beginning to cook Ling's body from within. The power of a few thousand microwave ovens turned on all at once. Ling's bodily fluids instantly start boiling dry as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As, light beaming from his eyes and mouth, Ling flash-coo from the inside out. Not simply burned. Horribly desiccated. His seared and darkened skin shrink-wrapped, mummy-like, around his skeleton. Human jerky. In a moment, it's finished. Ling's dry-roasted remains topple over. Su has closed a chapter.

dialogues.speaker: SAME SCENE
dialogues.text: Su and Fait meet on the tarmac. Su has the stones. Fait's holding Vanessa, asleep in his arms. SIRENS APPROACH in b.g. The two men regard each other a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got it all. (then)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happens to the stones?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll be destroyed. They see police and emergency vehicles beginning to arriv in b.g.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like I'll be doing some jail time. TOMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jail? Man, you just helped save the planet. Law's gotta allow for that. A look between Fait and Su.   Su nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll do what I can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's good, 'cause I mean, we make a helluva team, y'know? (to Su)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, not you, 'cause you're law enforcement. But the rest of us -- look, a white guy comes in handy now and then. Y'know, if you're pulling a job in Beverly Hills or ripping off a country club or whatever... What kind of percentage are we talking?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not. Fait looks at Vanessa again.     Finding a new purpose in eyes. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time I got real. He regards the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time we all did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get real?    What's that mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Means we're through with that life. Fait's eyes meet Tommy's.     Beat.   Tommy nods. Fait looks to Daria for her answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm with you, T. He looks to Miles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever you say, man. Fait looks back to Su.   They hold the look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Good luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Faith. Another beat. Then they turn and start walking toward the arriving cop cars. Daria and Miles follow. Archie and Tommy lag behind. As they all walk away from us --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What, you're all gonna go straight, just like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe oughta try it yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me? Are you kidding? I've had straight jobs. You ever had a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: straight job?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had plenty of straight jobs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Name one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I sold Avon door-to-door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... You were an Avon lady?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was an Avon man. You got a problem with that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's just, well, uh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah, I'm just fucking with you. (then)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But my momma did it, and don't you dare start disrespecting my momma... And so on... OFF which, we...
